description: Try our easy to follow Candy Cane Ice-Cream Sundaes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Candy Cane Ice-Cream Sundaes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove packaging from candy canes. Break 10 canes and place into a food processor. Pulse until roughly chopped.

Place ice-cream into a bowl. Add chopped candy canes and marshmallows, reserving 12 for decorating. Stir until combined then spoon into a 7 cup-capacity loaf tin. Cover and place in the freezer overnight.

Place remaining candy canes into food processor and pulse until finely chopped and transfer to a plate. Brush rim of 4 small parfait glasses with honey or liquid glucose. Dip rim into crushed candy canes to coat. Place scoops of ice-cream into glasses and decorate with reserved marshmallows and remaining crushed candy canes. Serve immediately.
